I lost my presentation remote recently so: 1. I'm an idiot 2. I could consider using a Nintendo Switch JoyCon 3. I could almost justify getting a Switch because of 2 4. I *totally* got a Switch 5. Using a JoyCon as a remote is a JOY! 6. My pun game is both on point and accurate
